statements: DELETE FROM PayrollInformation WHERE employee_id = 100 AND pay_date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2023-02-01' AND schedule_date <= '2023-02-15';
DELETE FROM schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1 AND date = '2022-05-20';
DELETE FROM payroll WHERE instructor_id = 2 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Payroll WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE schedule_id = 5002 AND attendance_status = 'Absent';
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 123 AND attendance_date = '2022-01-15';
